Title: Cranford
Actors: Judi Dench, Eileen Atkins, Philip Glenister, Imelda Staunton, Francesca Annis, Barbara Flynn, Joe McFadden, Simon Woods, Emma Fielding, Lisa Dillon, Julia Sawalha, Kimberley Nixon
Plot: In the 1840s, Cranford is ruled by the ladies. They adore good gossip; and romance and change is in the air, as the unwelcome grasp of the Industrial Revolution rapidly approaches their beloved rural market-town.
